title: Fuzzing Ladybird with tools from Google Project Zero
dot:
digraph Ladybird_Domato_Security_Test{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10, width=2.5];Domato[label="Domato (DOM Fuzzer)
Google Project Zero", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor="#ffeb3b"];Ladybird[label="Ladybird Browser", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor="#81d4fa"];Domato->Ladybird[label="Generate randomized HTML, CSS, JS"];issue1[label="Issue 1: Null Pointer Dereference
(mfrac inside th)", shape=box, style=dashed, fillcolor="#ffccbc"];Domato->issue1;issue1->"Fix 1: Check for Table Element
in Ancestor Chain"[label="Fix", style=solid, color=green]; issue2[label="Issue 2: No Window Object
in DOMParser Documents", shape=box, style=dashed, fillcolor="#ffccbc"];Domato->issue2;issue2->"Fix 2: Return Nullable Window
for Window-less Documents"[label="Fix", style=solid, color=green];issue3[label="Issue 3: Infinite Gradient
Reference Cycle", shape=box, style=dashed, fillcolor="#ffccbc"];Domato->issue3;issue3->"Fix 3: Detect Self-Referencing Gradients
and Cycle References"[label="Fix", style=solid, color=green];issue4[label="Issue 4: Iframe Access
After Removal", shape=box, style=dashed, fillcolor="#ffccbc"];Domato->issue4;issue4->"Fix 4: Add Null Check
for Detached Iframe"[label="Fix", style=solid, color=green];issue5[label="Issue 5: CPU Hog in
Sibling Traversal", shape=box, style=dashed, fillcolor="#ffccbc"];Domato->issue5;issue5->"Fix 5: Correct Sibling Chain Traversal"[label="Fix", style=solid, color=green];conclusion[label="Domato reveals bugs in Ladybird's handling of web content.
Five issues found and fixed, including a spec bug.
Next steps: Automate fuzz testing.", shape=plaintext, fontcolor="#333333", fontsize=12, style=bold]; issue5->conclusion[label="Next Step: Automate Fuzz Testing", style=dotted, color=blue];}

dot:

632 Stars | 55 Forks" shape=ellipse];Purpose[label="Purpose:

using CUDA and PyTorch" shape=note]; CodeFiles[label="Code Files" shape=folder];FlashCU[label="flash.cu

Benchmarking performance" shape=note];MainCPP[label="main.cpp
